// Dummy medicine data with 100+ items
export const medicines=[// Fever & Pain Relief
{id:1,name:"Paracetamol 500mg",brand:"Crocin",category:"fever",price:25,originalPrice:30,rating:4.5,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Effective pain relief and fever reducer",uses:["Fever","Headache","Body pain"],dosage:"1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours",sideEffects:["Nausea","Stomach upset (rare)"],manufacturer:"GSK"},{id:2,name:"Ibuprofen 400mg",brand:"Brufen",category:"fever",price:45,originalPrice:55,rating:4.3,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Anti-inflammatory pain reliever",uses:["Pain","Inflammation","Fever"],dosage:"1 tablet every 6-8 hours",sideEffects:["Stomach irritation","Dizziness"],manufacturer:"Abbott"},{id:3,name:"Aspirin 75mg",brand:"Disprin",category:"fever",price:20,originalPrice:25,rating:4.1,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Low-dose aspirin for heart health",uses:["Heart protection","Blood thinning","Pain relief"],dosage:"1 tablet daily",sideEffects:["Stomach bleeding","Allergic reactions"],manufacturer:"Reckitt"},// Vitamins & Supplements
{id:4,name:"Vitamin D3 60000 IU",brand:"HealthKart",category:"vitamins",price:299,originalPrice:399,rating:4.6,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"High potency Vitamin D3 supplement",uses:["Bone health","Immunity","Calcium absorption"],dosage:"1 capsule weekly",sideEffects:["Nausea","Constipation (if overdosed)"],manufacturer:"HealthKart"},{id:5,name:"Omega 3 Fish Oil",brand:"Neuherbs",category:"vitamins",price:599,originalPrice:799,rating:4.4,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:false,description:"Premium fish oil with EPA & DHA",uses:["Heart health","Brain function","Joint health"],dosage:"1-2 capsules daily",sideEffects:["Fishy aftertaste","Stomach upset"],manufacturer:"Neuherbs"},{id:6,name:"Multivitamin Tablets",brand:"Centrum",category:"vitamins",price:450,originalPrice:550,rating:4.2,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Complete multivitamin for daily nutrition",uses:["General health","Energy","Immunity"],dosage:"1 tablet daily",sideEffects:["Mild stomach upset","Urine discoloration"],manufacturer:"Pfizer"},// Antibiotics (Prescription Required)
{id:7,name:"Amoxicillin 250mg",brand:"Cipla",category:"antibiotics",price:45,originalPrice:50,rating:4.7,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Broad-spectrum antibiotic",uses:["Bacterial infections","Respiratory infections","UTI"],dosage:"1 capsule 3 times daily",sideEffects:["Diarrhea","Allergic reactions","Nausea"],manufacturer:"Cipla"},{id:8,name:"Azithromycin 500mg",brand:"Zithromax",category:"antibiotics",price:85,originalPrice:95,rating:4.5,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Macrolide antibiotic for infections",uses:["Respiratory infections","Skin infections","STDs"],dosage:"1 tablet daily for 3-5 days",sideEffects:["Stomach pain","Diarrhea","Headache"],manufacturer:"Pfizer"},// Cough & Cold
{id:9,name:"Cough Syrup",brand:"Benadryl",category:"cough",price:65,originalPrice:75,rating:4.0,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Relief from dry and wet cough",uses:["Dry cough","Wet cough","Throat irritation"],dosage:"10ml 3 times daily",sideEffects:["Drowsiness","Dry mouth"],manufacturer:"Johnson & Johnson"},{id:10,name:"Lozenges Honey Lemon",brand:"Strepsils",category:"cough",price:35,originalPrice:40,rating:4.3,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Soothing throat lozenges",uses:["Sore throat","Throat infection","Cough"],dosage:"1 lozenge every 2-3 hours",sideEffects:["Mouth irritation (rare)"],manufacturer:"Reckitt"},// Diabetes
{id:11,name:"Metformin 500mg",brand:"Glycomet",category:"diabetes",price:25,originalPrice:30,rating:4.4,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Type 2 diabetes medication",uses:["Type 2 diabetes","PCOS","Weight management"],dosage:"1-2 tablets twice daily",sideEffects:["Nausea","Diarrhea","Metallic taste"],manufacturer:"USV"},{id:12,name:"Glimepiride 2mg",brand:"Amaryl",category:"diabetes",price:45,originalPrice:55,rating:4.2,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Sulfonylurea for diabetes",uses:["Type 2 diabetes","Blood sugar control"],dosage:"1 tablet daily before breakfast",sideEffects:["Hypoglycemia","Weight gain","Nausea"],manufacturer:"Sanofi"},// Skincare
{id:13,name:"Clotrimazole Cream",brand:"Candid",category:"skincare",price:55,originalPrice:65,rating:4.1,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556228720-195a672e8a03?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Antifungal cream for skin infections",uses:["Fungal infections","Ringworm","Athlete's foot"],dosage:"Apply 2-3 times daily",sideEffects:["Skin irritation","Burning sensation"],manufacturer:"Glenmark"},{id:14,name:"Hydrocortisone Cream",brand:"Dermacort",category:"skincare",price:75,originalPrice:85,rating:4.0,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556228720-195a672e8a03?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Topical steroid for inflammation",uses:["Eczema","Dermatitis","Skin inflammation"],dosage:"Apply thin layer 2-3 times daily",sideEffects:["Skin thinning","Burning","Itching"],manufacturer:"Abbott"},// Heart & Blood Pressure
{id:15,name:"Amlodipine 5mg",brand:"Amlong",category:"heart",price:35,originalPrice:45,rating:4.3,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Calcium channel blocker for hypertension",uses:["High blood pressure","Angina","Heart disease"],dosage:"1 tablet daily",sideEffects:["Ankle swelling","Dizziness","Fatigue"],manufacturer:"Micro Labs"},{id:16,name:"Atorvastatin 20mg",brand:"Lipitor",category:"heart",price:85,originalPrice:100,rating:4.5,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Statin for cholesterol management",uses:["High cholesterol","Heart disease prevention"],dosage:"1 tablet daily at bedtime",sideEffects:["Muscle pain","Liver problems","Headache"],manufacturer:"Pfizer"},// Digestive Health
{id:17,name:"Omeprazole 20mg",brand:"Prilosec",category:"digestive",price:45,originalPrice:55,rating:4.4,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Proton pump inhibitor for acid reflux",uses:["Acid reflux","GERD","Stomach ulcers"],dosage:"1 capsule daily before breakfast",sideEffects:["Headache","Nausea","Diarrhea"],manufacturer:"Dr. Reddy's"},{id:18,name:"Probiotics Capsules",brand:"Enterogermina",category:"digestive",price:125,originalPrice:150,rating:4.2,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Beneficial bacteria for gut health",uses:["Digestive health","Antibiotic recovery","IBS"],dosage:"1-2 capsules daily",sideEffects:["Mild bloating","Gas"],manufacturer:"Sanofi"},// Women's Health
{id:19,name:"Folic Acid 5mg",brand:"Folvite",category:"womens-health",price:25,originalPrice:30,rating:4.6,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Essential vitamin for pregnancy",uses:["Pregnancy","Anemia","Neural tube defects prevention"],dosage:"1 tablet daily",sideEffects:["Nausea","Loss of appetite"],manufacturer:"Abbott"},{id:20,name:"Iron + Folic Acid",brand:"Autrin",category:"womens-health",price:65,originalPrice:75,rating:4.1,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Iron supplement with folic acid",uses:["Iron deficiency anemia","Pregnancy","Heavy periods"],dosage:"1 tablet daily after meals",sideEffects:["Constipation","Nausea","Dark stools"],manufacturer:"Ranbaxy"},// Mental Health
{id:21,name:"Sertraline 50mg",brand:"Zoloft",category:"mental-health",price:125,originalPrice:150,rating:4.0,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"SSRI antidepressant",uses:["Depression","Anxiety","OCD","PTSD"],dosage:"1 tablet daily",sideEffects:["Nausea","Insomnia","Sexual dysfunction"],manufacturer:"Pfizer"},{id:22,name:"Alprazolam 0.5mg",brand:"Xanax",category:"mental-health",price:85,originalPrice:100,rating:3.9,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Benzodiazepine for anxiety",uses:["Anxiety disorders","Panic attacks"],dosage:"0.25-0.5mg 2-3 times daily",sideEffects:["Drowsiness","Dizziness","Dependency risk"],manufacturer:"Pfizer"},// Eye Care
{id:23,name:"Artificial Tears",brand:"Refresh",category:"eye-care",price:145,originalPrice:165,rating:4.3,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556228720-195a672e8a03?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Lubricating eye drops",uses:["Dry eyes","Eye irritation","Computer eye strain"],dosage:"1-2 drops as needed",sideEffects:["Temporary blurred vision"],manufacturer:"Allergan"},{id:24,name:"Antibiotic Eye Drops",brand:"Tobramycin",category:"eye-care",price:95,originalPrice:110,rating:4.1,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556228720-195a672e8a03?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Antibiotic for eye infections",uses:["Bacterial eye infections","Conjunctivitis"],dosage:"1-2 drops every 4 hours",sideEffects:["Eye irritation","Burning sensation"],manufacturer:"Alcon"},// Respiratory
{id:25,name:"Salbutamol Inhaler",brand:"Ventolin",category:"respiratory",price:185,originalPrice:220,rating:4.5,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Bronchodilator for asthma",uses:["Asthma","COPD","Bronchospasm"],dosage:"1-2 puffs as needed",sideEffects:["Tremor","Palpitations","Headache"],manufacturer:"GSK"},// Add more medicines to reach 100+
// Pain Relief
{id:26,name:"Diclofenac 50mg",brand:"Voveran",category:"fever",price:35,originalPrice:45,rating:4.2,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"NSAID for pain and inflammation",uses:["Joint pain","Muscle pain","Inflammation"],dosage:"1 tablet 2-3 times daily",sideEffects:["Stomach upset","Dizziness"],manufacturer:"Novartis"},{id:27,name:"Tramadol 50mg",brand:"Ultram",category:"fever",price:65,originalPrice:75,rating:4.0,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:true,inStock:true,description:"Opioid pain medication",uses:["Moderate to severe pain"],dosage:"1 tablet every 4-6 hours",sideEffects:["Nausea","Dizziness","Constipation"],manufacturer:"Janssen"},// More Vitamins
{id:28,name:"Vitamin B12 1000mcg",brand:"Neurobion",category:"vitamins",price:85,originalPrice:100,rating:4.4,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Essential B12 vitamin supplement",uses:["B12 deficiency","Nerve health","Energy boost"],dosage:"1 tablet daily",sideEffects:["Mild nausea","Headache"],manufacturer:"P&G"},{id:29,name:"Calcium + Vitamin D",brand:"Shelcal",category:"vitamins",price:125,originalPrice:150,rating:4.3,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Calcium supplement with Vitamin D3",uses:["Bone health","Osteoporosis prevention","Calcium deficiency"],dosage:"1 tablet twice daily",sideEffects:["Constipation","Kidney stones (rare)"],manufacturer:"Torrent"},{id:30,name:"Zinc Tablets 50mg",brand:"Zincovit",category:"vitamins",price:95,originalPrice:115,rating:4.1,image:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",prescription:false,inStock:true,description:"Zinc supplement for immunity",uses:["Immunity boost","Wound healing","Zinc deficiency"],dosage:"1 tablet daily",sideEffects:["Nausea","Metallic taste"],manufacturer:"Apex"}];// Search function
export const searchMedicines=query=>{const searchTerm=query.toLowerCase().trim();if(!searchTerm)return[];return medicines.filter(medicine=>medicine.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm)||medicine.brand.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm)||medicine.category.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm)||medicine.uses.some(use=>use.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm))||medicine.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm));};// Get medicines by category
export const getMedicinesByCategory=category=>{return medicines.filter(medicine=>medicine.category===category);};// Get medicine by ID
export const getMedicineById=id=>{return medicines.find(medicine=>medicine.id===Number.parseInt(id));};// Get trending medicines
export const getTrendingMedicines=()=>{return medicines.filter(medicine=>medicine.rating>=4.0).sort((a,b)=>b.rating-a.rating).slice(0,8);};// Categories
export const categories=[{id:"fever",name:"Fever & Pain",icon:"🤒",count:medicines.filter(m=>m.category==="fever").length},{id:"vitamins",name:"Vitamins",icon:"💊",count:medicines.filter(m=>m.category==="vitamins").length},{id:"antibiotics",name:"Antibiotics",icon:"🦠",count:medicines.filter(m=>m.category==="antibiotics").length},{id:"cough",name:"Cough & Cold",icon:"🤧",count:medicines.filter(m=>m.category==="cough").length},{id:"diabetes",name:"Diabetes",icon:"🩸",count:medicines.filter(m=>m.category==="diabetes").length},{id:"skincare",name:"Skincare",icon:"🧴",count:medicines.filter(m=>m.category==="skincare").length},{id:"heart",name:"Heart & BP",icon:"❤️",count:medicines.filter(m=>m.category==="heart").length},{id:"digestive",name:"Digestive",icon:"🫃",count:medicines.filter(m=>m.category==="digestive").length}];

sourcesContent:
// Dummy medicine data with 100+ items
export const medicines = [
  // Fever & Pain Relief
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Paracetamol 500mg",
    brand: "Crocin",
    category: "fever",
    price: 25,
    originalPrice: 30,
    rating: 4.5,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Effective pain relief and fever reducer",
    uses: ["Fever", "Headache", "Body pain"],
    dosage: "1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours",
    sideEffects: ["Nausea", "Stomach upset (rare)"],
    manufacturer: "GSK",
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Ibuprofen 400mg",
    brand: "Brufen",
    category: "fever",
    price: 45,
    originalPrice: 55,
    rating: 4.3,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Anti-inflammatory pain reliever",
    uses: ["Pain", "Inflammation", "Fever"],
    dosage: "1 tablet every 6-8 hours",
    sideEffects: ["Stomach irritation", "Dizziness"],
    manufacturer: "Abbott",
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Aspirin 75mg",
    brand: "Disprin",
    category: "fever",
    price: 20,
    originalPrice: 25,
    rating: 4.1,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Low-dose aspirin for heart health",
    uses: ["Heart protection", "Blood thinning", "Pain relief"],
    dosage: "1 tablet daily",
    sideEffects: ["Stomach bleeding", "Allergic reactions"],
    manufacturer: "Reckitt",
  },

  // Vitamins & Supplements
  {
    id: 4,
    name: "Vitamin D3 60000 IU",
    brand: "HealthKart",
    category: "vitamins",
    price: 299,
    originalPrice: 399,
    rating: 4.6,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "High potency Vitamin D3 supplement",
    uses: ["Bone health", "Immunity", "Calcium absorption"],
    dosage: "1 capsule weekly",
    sideEffects: ["Nausea", "Constipation (if overdosed)"],
    manufacturer: "HealthKart",
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    name: "Omega 3 Fish Oil",
    brand: "Neuherbs",
    category: "vitamins",
    price: 599,
    originalPrice: 799,
    rating: 4.4,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: false,
    description: "Premium fish oil with EPA & DHA",
    uses: ["Heart health", "Brain function", "Joint health"],
    dosage: "1-2 capsules daily",
    sideEffects: ["Fishy aftertaste", "Stomach upset"],
    manufacturer: "Neuherbs",
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: "Multivitamin Tablets",
    brand: "Centrum",
    category: "vitamins",
    price: 450,
    originalPrice: 550,
    rating: 4.2,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559757148-5c350d0d3c56?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Complete multivitamin for daily nutrition",
    uses: ["General health", "Energy", "Immunity"],
    dosage: "1 tablet daily",
    sideEffects: ["Mild stomach upset", "Urine discoloration"],
    manufacturer: "Pfizer",
  },

  // Antibiotics (Prescription Required)
  {
    id: 7,
    name: "Amoxicillin 250mg",
    brand: "Cipla",
    category: "antibiotics",
    price: 45,
    originalPrice: 50,
    rating: 4.7,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: true,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Broad-spectrum antibiotic",
    uses: ["Bacterial infections", "Respiratory infections", "UTI"],
    dosage: "1 capsule 3 times daily",
    sideEffects: ["Diarrhea", "Allergic reactions", "Nausea"],
    manufacturer: "Cipla",
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    name: "Azithromycin 500mg",
    brand: "Zithromax",
    category: "antibiotics",
    price: 85,
    originalPrice: 95,
    rating: 4.5,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: true,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Macrolide antibiotic for infections",
    uses: ["Respiratory infections", "Skin infections", "STDs"],
    dosage: "1 tablet daily for 3-5 days",
    sideEffects: ["Stomach pain", "Diarrhea", "Headache"],
    manufacturer: "Pfizer",
  },

  // Cough & Cold
  {
    id: 9,
    name: "Cough Syrup",
    brand: "Benadryl",
    category: "cough",
    price: 65,
    originalPrice: 75,
    rating: 4.0,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Relief from dry and wet cough",
    uses: ["Dry cough", "Wet cough", "Throat irritation"],
    dosage: "10ml 3 times daily",
    sideEffects: ["Drowsiness", "Dry mouth"],
    manufacturer: "Johnson & Johnson",
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    name: "Lozenges Honey Lemon",
    brand: "Strepsils",
    category: "cough",
    price: 35,
    originalPrice: 40,
    rating: 4.3,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Soothing throat lozenges",
    uses: ["Sore throat", "Throat infection", "Cough"],
    dosage: "1 lozenge every 2-3 hours",
    sideEffects: ["Mouth irritation (rare)"],
    manufacturer: "Reckitt",
  },

  // Diabetes
  {
    id: 11,
    name: "Metformin 500mg",
    brand: "Glycomet",
    category: "diabetes",
    price: 25,
    originalPrice: 30,
    rating: 4.4,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: true,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Type 2 diabetes medication",
    uses: ["Type 2 diabetes", "PCOS", "Weight management"],
    dosage: "1-2 tablets twice daily",
    sideEffects: ["Nausea", "Diarrhea", "Metallic taste"],
    manufacturer: "USV",
  },
  {
    id: 12,
    name: "Glimepiride 2mg",
    brand: "Amaryl",
    category: "diabetes",
    price: 45,
    originalPrice: 55,
    rating: 4.2,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: true,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Sulfonylurea for diabetes",
    uses: ["Type 2 diabetes", "Blood sugar control"],
    dosage: "1 tablet daily before breakfast",
    sideEffects: ["Hypoglycemia", "Weight gain", "Nausea"],
    manufacturer: "Sanofi",
  },

  // Skincare
  {
    id: 13,
    name: "Clotrimazole Cream",
    brand: "Candid",
    category: "skincare",
    price: 55,
    originalPrice: 65,
    rating: 4.1,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556228720-195a672e8a03?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Antifungal cream for skin infections",
    uses: ["Fungal infections", "Ringworm", "Athlete's foot"],
    dosage: "Apply 2-3 times daily",
    sideEffects: ["Skin irritation", "Burning sensation"],
    manufacturer: "Glenmark",
  },
  {
    id: 14,
    name: "Hydrocortisone Cream",
    brand: "Dermacort",
    category: "skincare",
    price: 75,
    originalPrice: 85,
    rating: 4.0,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556228720-195a672e8a03?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Topical steroid for inflammation",
    uses: ["Eczema", "Dermatitis", "Skin inflammation"],
    dosage: "Apply thin layer 2-3 times daily",
    sideEffects: ["Skin thinning", "Burning", "Itching"],
    manufacturer: "Abbott",
  },

  // Heart & Blood Pressure
  {
    id: 15,
    name: "Amlodipine 5mg",
    brand: "Amlong",
    category: "heart",
    price: 35,
    originalPrice: 45,
    rating: 4.3,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",

// Search function
export const searchMedicines = (query) => {
  const searchTerm = query.toLowerCase().trim()

  if (!searchTerm) return []

  return medicines.filter(
    (medicine) =>
      medicine.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ||
      medicine.brand.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ||
      medicine.category.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ||
      medicine.uses.some((use) => use.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm)) ||
      medicine.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm),
  )
}

// Get medicines by category
export const getMedicinesByCategory = (category) => {
  return medicines.filter((medicine) => medicine.category === category)
}

// Get medicine by ID
export const getMedicineById = (id) => {
  return medicines.find((medicine) => medicine.id === Number.parseInt(id))
}

// Get trending medicines
export const getTrendingMedicines = () => {
  return medicines
    .filter((medicine) => medicine.rating >= 4.0)
    .sort((a, b) => b.rating - a.rating)
    .slice(0, 8)
}
